      private ModifiableFontInfo(String name, String description, String preferenceKey, String defaultFamily, int defaultStyle, int defaultSize)
      Modifiable font information constructor
      Parameters:
      name - Font name (for display)
      description - Font description (for tool tip)
      preferenceKey - Font program preferences key
      defaultFamily - Default font family
      defaultStyle - Default font style
      defaultSize - Default font size

    • getModifiableFontInfo

      protected static CcddConstants.ModifiableFontInfo getModifiableFontInfo(String prefKey)
      Get the modifiable font information reference with the specified program preferences key
      Parameters:
      prefKey - Modifiable font program preferences key
      Returns:
      Modifiable font information reference that has a program preferences key matching the one specified; null if no modifiable font's key matches

    • setModifiableFont

      private static void setModifiableFont(Component comp)
      Compare the font for the component to the modifiable fonts. If a match is found set the component's font to the current preferred font setting
      Parameters:
      comp - Component for which to check the font
